text: Hi friends, how are you all today?
Now let's see what surprise I have inside today
A cow
A horn
Come on
Now let's go and see how ChuChu and friends wake little boy blue up from his sleep to blow his horn
and to take care of his cows and sheep.
Little boy blue, come blow your horn
The sheep's in the meadow, the cow’s in the corn
Where’s the boy who looks after the sheep?
He’s under a haystack, fast asleep
Will you wake him? No, not I
For if I do, he’s sure to cry
I don’t have a clue
to wake little boy blue
How can I wake him without any pain?
I shall sprinkle this water like drops of rain
Now little boy blue woke up from his sleep
Searched for his horn in his pockets so deep
He blew his horn for the sheeps and the cows,
who all came down in straight rows
